sen.j: 大区小区制（だいくしょうくせい）は、日本の明治時代の1872年に施行された地方制度のこと。
sen.e: The daiku-shoku system is one of the local systems set up in 1872 during the Meiji Period.

sen.e: The ultimate purpose of the daiku-shoku system was to install a family resister system and the purpose was embodied in Jinshin-koseki (family registries in Jinshin), but the system itself was not well accepted among people.

sen.e: It is because the government undervalued villages and towns which had resolved various regional matters autonomously for a long period of time, but instead established an administrative body which did nothing but relay and enforce the orders of the central government.

sen.e: From the experience of the failed local system, the government established the Act for the alignment of local government system in 1878 and the practice of the local system was reviewed.
